title: Casbah Cafe and Mediterranean Kitchen
typeOfFood: Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Greek, Moroccan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mediterranean cafe downtown Livermore with free Wi-Fi. Regular menu is meat-heavy but does offer a separate vegetarian menu with vegan items marked - ask for it. Has combo plates, stews, soups, and salads. Vegan items are supposed to be prepared with separate utensils. Casual atmosphere.
